text: Lacking a good example that shows the use of the debugger. This page should also be quality assured to a greater extent than troubleshooting .. Eclipse helps you find errors in your code. It can be as trivial as you are missing a semicolon, or more complex problems relating to classes and methods to do. This is one of the main reasons we use Eclipse! It detects and given the opportunity to correct errors before running the program. Eclipse also has excellent support for analyzing running programs - so-called debugging. If you use this just saves a lot of time when you are struggling to understand why a program is not working properly.
